Pathfinder:
You can get into the following Kamaloka neighborhoods. But re-enter there will not work until your soul is restored after traveling to the world of dreams. Never forget it.
(In the vicinity of Kamaloka, one can enter only once a day.)
Enter Nightmare Hall (45 ~ 55 level)
Enter Nightmare Hall (50 ~ 60 level)
Enter Nightmare Hall (55 ~ 65 level)
Enter Nightmare Hall (60 ~ 70 level)
